item.title: DeepDiff: The Swiss Army Knife for Data Comparison in Python
item.description: When working with structured data in Python, we often need to compare two dictionaries, JSONs, or complex objects to find out what has changed. While direct comparison (==) is useful, sometimes we need to understand exactly what is different: which keys were added, which were removed, or where values have changed â€¦
item.dc:creator: Pablo Caro
